channel.title: Contributing on TRISA Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Contributing on TRISA Documentation

item.title: How to Contribute
item.description: The TRISA Protocol implementation is hosted on GitHub at https://github.com/trisacrypto/trisa. The codebase for the Global Directory Service is hosted on GitHub at https://github.com/trisacrypto/directory. The codebase for the TRISA TestNet is hosted on GitHub at https://github.com/trisacrypto/testnet. Setting up GitHub for Contributing Set up git signing. Create GPG (GNU Privacy Guard) keys to enable git signing to enable verified commits. Install the GPG command line tools. Generate a GPG key pair, and the GPG key must use RSA with a key size of 4096 bits.
